name: DashBall (itch) (SpencerP23)
description:
Dashing through space, our hero Dash is stopped when he comes across the evil base of the squares. Along with his sidekick, the invincible Dashball, navigate through the puzzles of the squares base and take the fight to them.

WASD to move, click in a direction to dash, and hold spacebar to pull the DashBall back to you. Complete the level by placing the DashBall into its blue goal, or by defeating the square chamber itself.

Developed with a team from the University of Virginia's Student Game Developers club.
